short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A highly customizable Bible verse reader that appears on and replaces the new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bible Verse Vista is a versatile and customizable Chrome extension designed to infuse the browsing experience with inspiration and spiritual reflection with daily Bible verses. With Bible Verse Vista, every new browser tab becomes an opportunity to engage with meaningful Scripture, offering a moment of pause and encouragement in your daily online activities. 

This experience can be customized to best suit a wide variety of personal preferences, including automatic or user-chosen verses, numerous serene background images that reflect the beauty of Godâ€™s creation, simple light and dark modes, and full user customization with colors, fonts, and much more.
